name: Import from GitHub
description: Import your GitHub repositories as boards and issues as card for the board.
author: Restya
settings_description:
Register a new application in GitHub in this URL https://github.com/settings/applications/new with providing below details,
Application Name: Restyaboard (Enter your site name)
Homepage URL: http://yourdomain.com (Enter your site URL)
Application description: Give some description about your site
Authorization callback URL: http://yourdomain.com/plugins/r_import_github/login.html
